name: TVContentItemImageShape
desc: An enumerated type that identifies the shape in which the content item should be displayed.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The content has no particular shape.

items.name: case poster
items.desc: The content has a width:height ratio of 2:3.

items.name: case square
items.desc: The content has a width:height ratio of 1:1.

items.name: case SDTV
items.desc: The content is standard-definition television content with a width:height ratio of 4:3.

items.name: case HDTV
items.desc: The content is high-definition television content with a width:height ratio of 16:9.

items.name: case wide
items.desc: The content has a width:height ratio of 8:3.

items.name: case extraWide
items.desc: The content has a width:height ratio of 80:27.
